npcSpeech.text: Hallo there! It's not usual we get people coming from your direction. Where are you headed?
Heh-heh. Right then, well this is probably the right direction.
Do you know how to get around?
Well if you need any help just ask!
Ah! Maybe I can help then! All you have to do is slide in which-so-ever direction you choose and you will keep moving till you stop. So let's say if I slide down here I will stop at the rock. See?
I'll be here for you regardless. It's an honour...

Ok. Great! So I had mentioned how rocks stop you. There's another thing that could happen. If you slide onto a rough piece of ground, you'll stop on top of it. That may seem like a small difference but it can make a huge difference in where you want to go. You'll see the difference. Look!
Maybe you should try out what I told you a bit first. Explore, practice a little.
That is all I have for you at the moment... I'm sure we'll see each other soon though.
That means a lot to me. Thank you. I always beieved I'd be doing something this important...
I think you should keep moving now.
